elements.name: Validate the EMI pie chart in Home loan Section

steps.name: user navigates to the app URL
verify the EMI with below data
verify that pie char percentage is greater than zero

steps.name: set the personal loan slider with below data

check the availability of bar chart
count the number of bars available
Read the values from any one bar tool tip
